title: Apple iPad mini 2 Review
description:
For more details, check out our web site: http://www.phonearena.com/reviews/Apple-iPad-mini-2-Review_id3501
The iPad mini just had one glaring omission -- it lacked Apple's fancy termed Retina Display. Well folks, Apple made sure to remedy that with this year's model, the aptly named Apple iPad mini with Retina Display. Armed with that higher resolution display that we desperately sought out last year, it's also blessed with the usual assortment of upgrades...
